verses.roman:
śuniyā hāsena prabhu ānandita-mane
bhaṭṭācārya kaila prabhu dṛḍha āliṅgane

synonyms: śuniyā—hearing this explanation; hāsena—laughs; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ānandita-mane—with great pleasure in His mind; bhaṭṭācārya—unto Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kaila—did; prabhu—the Lord; dṛḍha—firm; āliṅgane—embracing.
translation: Upon hearing this explanation, the Lord began to laugh and, with great pleasure, immediately embraced Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya very firmly.
